summary: THE VEHICLE MAKES A POPPING NOISE WHEN BRAKING OR HITS A BUMP.  STEERING ALSO SHIFTS.  HE SAYS HE HAS HAD PROBLEMS WITH THE STRUTS, WHICH HE HAS HAD REPLACED, ALONG WITH THE ENGINE AND THE TRANSMISSION MOUNTS.  ALSO THE INNER AND OUTER TIRE RODS AND THE MANUFACTURER STATES HIS AUTO IS NOT IN A RECALL.       TS
